<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Potion Patch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2123)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 97 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>command</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You must have the _potion patch_ affixed to your skin.
</row>

</column>

---

A _potion patch_ is a sticky, bandage-like pad that can be filled with one [potion](/equipment/consumables/potions) and affixed to the skin. Filling the patch and affixing it is a 1-minute activity that takes two hands and has the [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) trait. A patch has a maximum level of potion it can absorb, depending on the patch's type. When you Activate the patch, the potion affects you without you needing to have the potion in your hand. The patch's magic is negated after it's used, the next time you make your daily preparations, or when another _potion patch_ is affixed to you, whichever comes first.
